entries.kaja_orzee: Access to secured areas of the retreat is prohibited unless on official Imperial business.
entries.veers: You can not enter the Throne Room until Veers gives you permission.
entries.loam_redge: You can not enter the library until Loam Redge gives you permission.
entries.vader: Only Lord Vader and his personal charges have access to this area.
entries.lord_hethrir: You may not enter the secure area until Lord Hethrir has deemed you worthy.
entries.emperor: You do not yet have permission to access this area.
entries.not_imperial: Only members of the Empire are allowed entry into these halls.
